Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // This Parameter should be updated when synced from Perforce

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Data:
<report xmlns='http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition' queryClass='Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.StoredProc.AdmsBySource' queryName='GetAdmissions' name='AdmsBySource'>
<parameter expression='..DateFrom'/> <parameter expression='..DateTo'/> <parameter expression='..Facility'/> <parameter expression='..AdmSource'/>
<attribute name='datefrom' expression='..DisplayDate(..DateFrom)'/> <attribute name='dateto' expression='..DisplayDate(..DateTo)'/> <attribute name='facility' expression='..GetHospListDesc(..Facility)'/> <attribute name='AdmSource' expression='..GetADSOUListDesc(..AdmSource)'/>
<attribute name='ReportTitle' expression='$$$Text("@AdmissionsBySource@Admissions By Source")'/> <attribute name='timestamp' expression='$ZDATETIME($H, 2, 2)'/> <attribute name='username' expression='..Username'/>
<group name="facility" breakOnField="HOSPDesc"> <attribute name="description" field="HOSPDesc" /> <aggregate name='TotalHosp' type='CUSTOM' field='PAADMRowId' class='%ZEN.Report.Aggregate.CountDistinct'/>
<group name="AdmSource" breakOnField="ADSOUDesc"> <attribute name="description" field="ADSOUDesc" /> <aggregate name='TotalADSOU' type='CUSTOM' field='PAADMRowId' class='%ZEN.Report.Aggregate.CountDistinct'/>
<element name='CaptionOne' expression='"Date of"_$C(13,10)_"Birth"' /> <element name='CaptionTwo' expression='"Admission"_$C(13,10)_"Date"' /> <element name='CaptionThree' expression='"Discharge"_$C(13,10)_"Date"' />
<group name='Detail'> <attribute field='CurrentWARD' name='CurrentWARD'/> <attribute field='PAADMAdmNo' name='PAADMAdmNo'/> <attribute field='PAPMINo' name='PAPMINo'/> <attribute fields='PAPMIName,PAPMIName2' name='PatientName' expression='..DisplayName(%val("PAPMIName"),%val("PAPMIName2"))'/> <attribute field='PAADMAdmDate' name='PAADMAdmDate' expression='..DisplayDate(%val)'/> <attribute field="PAADMDischgDate" name="PAADMDischgDate" expression='..DisplayDate(%val)'/> <attribute field='PAPMIDOB' name='PAPMIDOB' expression='..DisplayDate(%val)'/> <attribute field='IPATCode' name='IPATCode'/> <attribute field='CTSEXCode' name='CTSEXCode'/> <attribute field='TRDCode' name='TRDCode'/> <attribute field='AgeAdm' name='AgeAdm'/> <attribute field='TRANSWARD' name='TRANSWARD'/> <attribute field='TRANSLOC' name='TRANSLOC'/> </group> </group> </group> </report>

XData.name: ReportDisplay
